content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error message when attempting to use the browse_website command to visit AllTrails. As a result, I decided to use the web_search command to search for the best hiking trails near Brno. The web_search command returned several links to hiking trails, including AllTrails and Komoot. Additionally, I executed the execute_shell command and received a list of files in my directory. I then received a message to read a file called "atlas.yaml" and got information about Atlas, who is an adventuring soul. I also executed a Python code to search for hiking trails near Brno using the Google Maps API, but got an error message.
"""
